list-view-config.query-select:
PREFIX arm: <https://w3id.org/core/ontology/0.1/> PREFIX bf: <http://id.loc.gov/ontologies/bibframe/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?boundCollection ?label ?preferredTitle ?titleValue
WHERE { ?subject ?property ?boundCollection . ?boundCollection a arm:BoundCollection ; rdfs:label ?label .
OPTIONAL { ?boundCollection arm:hasPreferredTitle ?title .
?preferredTitle a bf:Title ; rdf:value ?titleValue . } }
